twoSetSkill.name: Grace Judgment 2 Pieces
twoSetSkill.description: Spend at least 15, 70, and 125 SP at once to gain 8%, 15%, and 22% Total DMG Multiplier respectively for the entire team. Lasts 7s. Effect cannot stack.

threeSetSkill.name: Holy Mending 3 Pieces
threeSetSkill.description: When hitting an impaired enemy, the host heals 8% HP and gains 5% SP. CD: 8s.
